website_summaries.verdict: This set includes a lot of play options for the price.
pros: Nine different activity stations make this a good value for the price
Includes a snack stand and sand box area
Does not generally take as long as other Backyard Discovery sets to assemble
cons: While this does have a monkey bar set, it is not very long
The covered area is not a closed-in fort like some

customer_reviews.title: Solid play set.
customer_reviews.text: Play set is solid. Very solid. Don't listen to the folks saying the wood feels flimsy. It's cedar, so it's not dense, but naturally resistant to rot. Took me 3 days to put together, but that was with working by myself, in between rain storms. It's manageable doing it alone, but I'd recommend a helping hand if possible, for some parts at least. Manufacturer includes some extra bolts, nuts and other hardware incase you need them, came in handy when I stripped out a t-nut (my own fault). All parts are labeled with a part number. Instructions are clear. Overall great product. No missing pieces at all. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H

customer_reviews.title: Waste Of money
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly designed!! The wood is very cheap and most of the pieces were already cracked upon opening the boxes up!! It's very little and it's really only fit for ages 2-5 year old... Please do not buy this swing set hoping to put it together in a nick of time!!! There's many parts and most of them you'll have to readjust in order to make them fit!! I spent $860.00 on this and I'm very unsatisfied!! The set looks great once put together, but looks are deceiving!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Life

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: The playset went up easily for my husband and one other. They sorted pieces, assembled sections, and built it within about 9 hours (both men are very handy)... My only complaint would be that I wish the wood was a bit thicker. It's definitely sturdy enough, especially for my young grandchildren, but it would have made the playset a 5 star build if the wood planks were thicker.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ware

customer_reviews.title: Boards had split and were glued back together by the company.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this playset we just got it put up yesterday. But some of the bolts were missing and some of the boards split and you could tell they were obviously glued back together. The wood isn't treated so when it gets warm well have to treat it ourselves. It took almost 10 hours with 3 people putting this together. The boards are not as sturdy and thick like I thought they would be, but over all my 2 year old loves this. If she was older I probably would have ordered something bigger it's not as big as I thought it was going to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Schedule 2-3 days to assemble with a friend
customer_reviews.text: Requires a good effort to sort the different parts: the wood, the screws. MUST have a power tool; don't use the hand-tool provided.....you'll never get it done. The "cedar" finish started coming off immediately. Wood is very soft. After a year, the slide is cracked.
customer_reviews.author: kstancik

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful but make sure to have the time to build
customer_reviews.text: This play set came in two large boxes at a total of 400lbs. It contained every piece down to the washers. It was amazing to use the App for building instructions instead of just the written booklet. My husband is very handy but it still took 19hrs to sort and organize as well as build completely. I helped hold when necessary but mostly had to be with our two young children. We can’t wait to enjoy it. We don’t have any information regarding wear due to just putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to install but the quality of the wood is not the best I wish I had read all of the reviews on it before purchasing it if I had to spend a little bit more money I probably would’ve gotten a better one. Had it over just a little over a year but only put it up in February and already looks like it’s been there for 15 years
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this set for my 2 year old as well as a beginning set for a Daycare I am starting, I was super disappointed once we got it up as the wood started peeling right away. I hope it will hold up for more than a summer or two considering the amount of money we spent. I should have gone local for better quality and affordability.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday gift for my 2 boys. The 5 y.o. is in love with it, the 1 y.o. (well he needs some more time...) However, that being said, quality is decent, there was some warped boards, but we made it work. Took 2 of us a few nights after work to put this puppy together. But it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable little swing set! Sturdy, good value for the money! Took my father and husband about 7 hours to build. My girls love it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Devroy-Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s extremely small very cheaply made for the money you pay for it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shipment was incomplete
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive part of the product. I didn’t receive the tobogan (slider) and other pieces to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Gina G. Beato

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: For as much as it costs, I was surpised at how flimsy it is. We added extra support to it. But its not terrible. Would i purchase it knowing the outcome?...probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived as expected, but missing a part
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived as expected; however, a part was missing. Need to figure out how to obtain the missing part, so that it can be put together.
customer_reviews.author: S. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Fun and relatively easy to DIY
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Not too bad to install took about a full day.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price. Easy to understand directions.
customer_reviews.author: Travis H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed very low quality material
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap material and very weak everytime my daughter uses the swing the whole thing moves and feels like its going to fall apart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wood
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap wood and mostly for toddlers . I feel like if I let any older kids get on it they’d break the playground.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Pena

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for DIY'ers
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product assembled which was exactly what we expected. Took about 30 labor hours to assemble with from 2-6 people helping. Most of the assembly requires at least two people. Very well engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Driod 2

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: We haven't even had it for a year board r cracking clear through
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and my 2
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together by himself (mostly) inside of 2 days. Sturdy and my 2.5 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing FIVE nut lock bolts. Basically took a day to build this thing and had to stop halfway to go buy parts because we were too far in to wait to be sent some. Really disappointing that pieces are just missing
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Actually purchased this from Walmart but wanted to leave a review. It took 10hrs and 2 people to put together but def love the look. Beautiful and sturdy. My 2 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This set is best for the under 5 crowd
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered this set from Walmart. We have had it for about 6 months and already parts of it have broken. Any kids over the age of 6 or 7 will be too large for this playground. When my daughters both swing, aged 6 and 7, the entire structure moves back and forth. The slide is very small as are the monkey bars. This set is best for the under 5 crowd. When I read the specs for the product, I thought this would be a great playset for our children but the truth is we are looking into a more expensive, better constructed set. I would not waste my money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: mkmkindle

customer_reviews.title: Great Set - Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: We love this set! It had everything we were looking for and was right in our price range. There are lots of features to keep the kids busy - they love the little snack bench and fort area the most. Assembly did take some time, but as long as you stay organized it's not too terrible. I would have only given this set 4 stars because there were some broken pieces in the boxes, but Backyard Discovery's customer service was very helpful in getting us replacements in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good value but not as sturdy as I would have Liked out of the box
customer_reviews.text: My parents and sister gifted this play set to my kids as an early birthday present. I go the joy of assembly. The instructions are very well laid out. I made few minor changes to the set, most notably building a custom longer support beam for the swings to allow the addition of a saucer swing. Overall the kids love it. Note for the Assembler: Have at least one good screw gun, 2 preferably. I recommend using stainless steel screws where possible The wood is similar to domestic cedar however it is softer, be wary of over tightening any hardware as cracks can occur rapidly.
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: Split boards
customer_reviews.text: Within an hour of it being built, my three year old was swinging on it and the a frame for the swings split making it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Parkin

customer_reviews.title: ... set for over a year now and could not love it more
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for over a year now and could not love it more! It has held up with our crazy four season weather and my kids love it. It's sturdy, safe and is very aesthetically pleasing. I'd recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this swing set!!
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that my kids love this swing set. I wouldn’t say that it’s huge by any means but there is a lot of stuff for them to play on. I personally like the shorter monkey bars. Friends of ours have a set with really high monkey bars and my daughter is afraid to use them. Took all weekend for my husband and father in law to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy H

customer_reviews.title: Adore this set!
customer_reviews.text: Our family adores this set! Plenty of fun aspects for our large family to enjoy, it’s a great price, and it looks great in our backyard. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Traena Bennett

product_meta.title: Backyard Discovery Monticello All Cedar Wood Playset Swing Set
product_meta.description: The Monticello cedar wood swing set has all the features of more expensive outdoor swing sets at a terrific value. It has a raised play fort with a wooden roof, and end gables. A raised sun porch is the perfect platform for first checking out the yard from above and then launching down the 8' Super Safe Speedy Slide. Two ladders, a standard and an open rock wall, let kids climb at their own pace, their own way. A set of monkey bars let them fly high. There's also a wooden swing set with two belt swings and trapeze swing for even more fun. Below there's a snack stand covered by a stylish pergola, built-in toy box, and even room for a sand box. The Monticello will last for years and will be the envy of your neighborhood. Upper deck height: 4'
feature_bullets: One of our most popular kid swing sets for kids outdoor featuring a play fort with slide, 2 belt swings, a trapeze swing, monkey bars and a sandbox
Heavy duty Backyard Discovery kids fort with end gables and wood roof
The swing set hardware includes a lower play area with wooden sandbox area, a built-in toy box and a pergola-covered lemonade stand
Two standard belt plastic swing set swings and a trapeze swing . An 8 foot playground slide - super safe but speedy
A rock climbing wall ladder and a standard ladder. A challenging monkey bars for backyard fun. Maximum children - 9

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars62 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Manufacturer: Backyard Discovery- Leisure Time Products, Inc. - Dropship
